long_description: Attach the little Snow Peak Lapel Torch flashlight to a shirt, backpack sternum strap or around a trekking pole for hands-free lighting while you're on the go. Small LED light has a magnetic clip so you can easily attach the light to a number of different items depending on your need. LED outputs 70 lumens and projects a beam up to 35m on high; switch to low for a 7-lumen beam that reaches 7m. A 28-in. cord connects the battery pack and light, allowing you to stash the battery pack out of the way in a backpack or jacket pocket. Wrap the cord around the battery pack and use the Lapel Torch as a handheld flashlight. 3 AAA batteries (included) power the light for up to 55 hrs. on high and 140 hrs. on low. IPX4 water resistance provides reliability in inclement weather. Snow Peak Lapel Torch flashlight weighs only 3 oz.
short_description: Attach the little Snow Peak Lapel Torch flashlight to a shirt, backpack sternum strap or around a trekking pole for hands-free lighting while you're on the go.
